SELECT ah.att_history_code, em.employee_code, em.employee_id, em.name, ah.attendance_date, ah.att_code, ah.attendance_time, ah.leave_time, NUMBER_TO_MINUTE(ah.total_worktime) AS total_worktime , NUMBER_TO_MINUTE(ah.overtime_worktime) AS overtime_worktime, NUMBER_TO_MINUTE(ah.night_worktime) AS night_worktime, NUMBER_TO_MINUTE(ah.weekend_worktime) AS weekend_worktime, ai.att_name
FROM att_history ah JOIN employees em ON (ah.employee_code = em.employee_code) JOIN att_item ai ON (ah.att_code = ai.att_code)
WHERE em.employee_code = #{employeeCode} AND TO_CHAR(attendance_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearCondition} || '-' || #{monthCondition}
ORDER BY attendance_date ASC
